snippet.title: Simulacrum - Gameplay Footage
snippet.description:
Now available (pay-what-you-want or free): https://gamejolt.com/games/simulacrum_chapter_one/233384
---
A selection of footage from the first chapter of Simulacrum showing a few areas and game-play mechanics.
---
